member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SaturationEffect.Saturation
member.summary: Gets or sets the saturation intensity for effect.

remarks.p: The saturation of the image. You can set the saturation to a value between 0 and 1. If you set it to 1 the output image is fully saturated. If you set it to 0 the output image is monochrome.
